<Extension()> Public Function ListByOS (operations As IManagedClusterVersionsOperations, location As String, osType As String) As IList(Of ManagedClusterVersionDetails)

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
The location for the cluster code versions. This is different from cluster location.
The operating system of the cluster. Possible values include: 'Windows', 'Ubuntu', 'RedHat', 'Ubuntu18_04'
Docs.summary: Gets the list of Service Fabric cluster code versions available for the specified OS type.
Docs.remarks: Gets all available code versions for Service Fabric cluster resources by OS type.
